summary: The concept of "school textbook" falls under the category of "organisation of teaching" within EU legal and regulatory frameworks. School textbooks serve as essential educational resources, facilitating the dissemination of knowledge and supporting pedagogical methodologies across member states. The EU emphasizes the importance of high-quality educational materials to enhance learning outcomes and promote educational equity. Regulatory initiatives may address standards for content, accessibility, and alignment with national curricula, ensuring that school textbooks contribute effectively to the overall organisation of teaching. This concept is integral to fostering a cohesive educational environment that meets the diverse needs of students across Europe.
